tag_list: interior-designer, architect, trade-only, wholesale, facility-manager, landscape-designer, builder, developer, furniture, fabric, seating, lighting, casegoods, surfaces, todl, todl-com
overview:
Stacey created TODL.com after working in a boutique design and construction firm that managed projects in residential, contract and hospitality sectors and included design inception, planning, drawings, client presentations, specification, purchasing and installation.

Stacey’s career in the design industry began in design research and grew to include resource management, project coordination, coordination and planning between trades, budget and critical path tracking, specification, purchasing and client relationships

After several years of managing multiple residential, contract and hospitality projects of all types and budget ranges, she created and launched the Trade Only Design Library, Inc. in 1997, creating the industryâ€™s largest online design library exclusively for trade professionals.

Stacey works in a full time capacity as TODLâ€™s CEO.
